panels.description: If the graph is non-empty, it means that some CoreDNS requests resulted in panic. You can see a specific error in the container logs.
panels.title: CoreDNS panic count

panels.description: If the graph is non-empty, it means that some CoreDNS requests resulted in panic. You can see a specific error in the container logs.
panels.title: CoreDNS Forward Healthcheck Failure Count

targets.expr:
sum(rate(coredns_cache_hits_total{job="kube-dns", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)
/
(
sum(rate(coredns_cache_hits_total{job="kube-dns", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod) +
sum(rate(coredns_cache_misses_total{job="kube-dns", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod) 
)
